attributes.action: KEEP A GOOD EYE ON CHECHY RICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE SUGGEST THAT YOU DISPATCH ANTO TO SOMEWHERE IN ENGLAND IN THE HOPE THAT THERE WILL BE SOME BOOZE LEFT IN DUBLIN FOR THE REST OF US,SIGNED:ANDY,ROSS,KAVO,THE TRUMPET,THE FRIDGE,HILTON,

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
